name: Fish Fighter
description:
WebGL is lower graphical quality and lacks some polishing features; download the game for the full intended experience.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
If you play, I'd appreciate a rating at my Ludum Dare page
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Fishing game + top down shooter

Did you catch the fish, or did they catch you? As you get pulled underwater to fight them off with your bare hands… and guns.

Made this for the compo but had an annoying bug stopping me from compiling. Fixed the bug and changed nothing else (as you can see by some bugs) but had to put it in for the jam.
